name: Undead Tabbard
description: The Undead tabard is a nice way to add a little darkness to your character. This unique tabard can be worn under your dark knight armor allowing the demonic head to show.  But do not expect to pass yourself as a lawful good wearing this piece.  Available in one size only!

name: Basic Tabard, Green and Beige
description: A tabard is an essential part to any army. This basic tabard will help your allies easily identify you on the battle field and bring unison to your group. The tie strings on either side allows for quick dress and gives a tapered look.  Dress your legion now!

name: Basic Tabard, Dark Red
description: A tabard is an essential part to any army. This basic tabard will help your allies easily identify you on the battle field and bring unison to your group. The tie strings on either side allows for quick dress and gives a tapered look. Dress your legion now!

name: Black Ice Tabbard
description: The symbol of justice in a world ruled by corruption, the Black Ice tabard stands as a true force. Piece together an army of unwavering loyalty, wearing with pride the colors of your patriarch, the mightiest of mighty.  Usually worn by warriors as a means to identify each other on the field, it will also rally your allies off the field.

name: Basic Tabard, Black
description: You will stand tall and proud with this fitted black tabard.  The tabard gives new meaning to strength in numbers, giving you a sense of invincibility and comradery when worn atop your armor. Bring pride to family by donning this classic medieval tabard.

name: Basic Tabard, Black and White
description: A crucial part to any army this Black and white Tabard has a beautiful tapered fit and ties easily on each side. Become part of a fellowship that stands for what you believe and look great while doing it. Wear it with pride as you carry your banner onto the field of battle and identify yourself to your enemies, showing them your true colors.

name: Basic Tabard, Blue and White
description: Colors make it easier for a soldier to be recognized on the battlefield but it also makes for an easier target. But why not do it in style with this beautiful blue and white fitted tabard. Stand amongst your fellow fighters and give style to your army.

name: Basic Tabard, Off White
description: This tabard embodies the spirit and the tradition of the middle ages. Designed to enhance your Larp costume, this tabard features slits on the front and the back as to not impede movement during battle. The sleeveless design, slotted neck with ties on either side, make easy to put on and take off. Embrace your allegiance and wear it proudly.

name: Basic Tabard, Dark Red and Beige
description: If the legends of the knights are true then this tabard is the epitome of loyalty and pride. Designed to give a sense of belonging and allegiance to a cause, a soldier would wear this type of tabard and give his dying breath to protect all who wear these colors.  Embrace the medieval way and bring your costume to life.
